com.io7m.jcanephora.renderstate

Interface JCGLStencilStateType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JCGLStencilState, JCGLStencilStateMutable

    @Value.Immutable
 @Value.Modifiable
public interface JCGLStencilStateType
    Stencil testing/writing state.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getStencilEnabled

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default boolean getStencilEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if stencilling is enabled

      • getStencilStrict

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default boolean getStencilStrict()
        Enable or disable strict mode. If strict mode is enabled, then attempting to enable stencil writing/testing will fail with an exception if the currently bound framebuffer does not have a stencil buffer.
        Returns:
        true iff strict mode is enabled

      • getTestFunctionFront

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default JCGLStencilFunction getTestFunctionFront()
        Returns:
        The stencil function for front faces

      • getTestFunctionBack

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default JCGLStencilFunction getTestFunctionBack()
        Returns:
        The stencil function for back faces

      • getTestMaskBack

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default int getTestMaskBack()
        Returns:
        The stencil function mask value for back faces

      • getTestMaskFront

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default int getTestMaskFront()
        Returns:
        The stencil function mask value for front faces

      • getTestReferenceBack

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default int getTestReferenceBack()
        Returns:
        The stencil function reference value for back faces

      • getTestReferenceFront

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default int getTestReferenceFront()
        Returns:

      • getOperationStencilFailBack

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default JCGLStencilOperation getOperationStencilFailBack()
        Returns:
        The operation specified for back faces that fail the stencil test

      • getOperationDepthFailBack

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default JCGLStencilOperation getOperationDepthFailBack()
        Returns:
        The operation specified for back faces that fail the depth test

      • getOperationPassBack

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default JCGLStencilOperation getOperationPassBack()
        Returns:
        The operation specified for back faces that pass all tests

      • getOperationStencilFailFront

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default JCGLStencilOperation getOperationStencilFailFront()
        Returns:
        The operation specified for front faces that fail the stencil test

      • getOperationDepthFailFront

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default JCGLStencilOperation getOperationDepthFailFront()
        Returns:
        The operation specified for front faces that fail the depth test

      • getOperationPassFront

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default JCGLStencilOperation getOperationPassFront()
        Returns:
        The operation specified for front faces that pass all tests

      • getWriteMaskFrontFaces

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default int getWriteMaskFrontFaces()
        Returns:
        The write mask value specified for front faces

      • getWriteMaskBackFaces

        @Value.Parameter
 @Value.Default
default int getWriteMaskBackFaces()
        Returns:
        The write mask value specified for back faces
